pokemons.name: Victini
pokemons.description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

pokemons.name: Snivy
pokemons.description: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

pokemons.name: Servine
pokemons.description: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

pokemons.name: Serperior
pokemons.description: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

pokemons.name: Tepig
pokemons.description: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

pokemons.name: Pignite
pokemons.description: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

pokemons.name: Emboar
pokemons.description: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

pokemons.name: Oshawott
pokemons.description: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

pokemons.name: Dewott
pokemons.description: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

pokemons.name: Samurott
pokemons.description: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.
